nodes.text: The Art of Revenge of the Sith

The Art of Revenge of the Sith was a 3-part supplement series to The Art of Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith that was featured in Star Wars Insider 83, 84, and 85. It was written by Jonathan W. Rinzler (the author of the book) and showcased various works of art that did not make it into the final cut of book itself.
The Art of Revenge of the Sith, Part One
The Art of Revenge of the Sith, Part Two
Along with Episode III concepts, Part 2 included Star Wars related drawings by some of the artists when they were children.
The Art of Revenge of the Sith, Part Three
